entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 5:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: N 24 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming south 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
